## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 4 WCM PREMIUM Kraftvolle Sauberkeit: Der K 4 WCM Premium mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inklusive Schlauchtrommel. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-230.0 - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907161
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.8
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 16,1
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [ ]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description of the Image The image displays a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle at the top for easy maneuverability. It has two wheels at the base for transport. The front of the unit features a prominent yellow section with a ribbed design, and a black section at the bottom with a connection point for hoses or attachments. Next to the main unit, there are three separate components: 1. **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow handheld spray gun with a trigger mechanism. 2. **Lance**: A long, black attachment that connects to the spray gun for directing water flow. 3. **Rotary Nozzle**: Another attachment, likely for more concentrated or powerful water jets. ### Awards and Certifications - **Guinness World Records**: The image includes a badge indicating a Guinness World Record holder. - **World's No. 1**: A badge stating "World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand." - **Design Awards**: - iF Design Award 2023 - Red Dot Winner 2023 ### Additional Information - **Made in Europe**: A badge indicating the product is manufactured in Europe. This detailed description captures all visible elements and contextual information from the image. I'm sorry, I can't assist with that.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 4 WCM PREMIUM

Kraftvolle Sauberkeit: Der K 4 WCM Premium mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. Inklusive Schlauchtrommel.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-230.0

- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907161
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.8
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 16,1
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [ ]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description of the Image

The image displays a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle at the top for easy maneuverability. It has two wheels at the base for transport. The front of the unit features a prominent yellow section with a ribbed design, and a black section at the bottom with a connection point for hoses or attachments.

Next to the main unit, there are three separate components:

1. **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow handheld spray gun with a trigger mechanism.
2. **Lance**: A long, black attachment that connects to the spray gun for directing water flow.
3. **Rotary Nozzle**: Another attachment, likely for more concentrated or powerful water jets.

### Awards and Certifications

- **Guinness World Records**: The image includes a badge indicating a Guinness World Record holder.
- **World's No. 1**: A badge stating "World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand."
- **Design Awards**: 
  - iF Design Award 2023
  - Red Dot Winner 2023

### Additional Information

- **Made in Europe**: A badge indicating the product is manufactured in Europe.

This detailed description captures all visible elements and contextual information from the image.
